meanings.definition: Not producing or having sex organs
meanings.sent1: The agamous plant did not have any flowers or seeds.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the agamous species that reproduced without needing male and female parts.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see an agamous tree trying to flirt with a cactus.
meanings.sent4: The agamous garden was like a silent library, devoid of any reproductive activity.
meanings.sent5: The agamous organisms were like mysterious puzzles, lacking the usual pieces for reproduction.

meanings.sent1: The agamous animals multiplied through a process that did not involve mating.
meanings.sent2: In the agamous world, offspring were created without the need for male and female interactions.
meanings.sent3: The agamous party was a unique event where no one brought a plus one.
meanings.sent4: The agamous community thrived on creativity, finding new ways to propagate without traditional methods.
meanings.sent5: The agamous ecosystem was a self-sustaining marvel, bypassing the need for sexual reproduction.

meanings.sent1: The agamous organism reproduced by itself, without the need for a partner.
meanings.sent2: The agamous cells divided and multiplied independently, showcasing asexual reproduction.
meanings.sent3: It was a comedy of errors when the agamous amoeba tried to go on a blind date.
meanings.sent4: The agamous colony was a solo act, thriving without the complications of sexual reproduction.
meanings.sent5: The agamous creature was a lone ranger, navigating the world without the need for a mate.
